Reviews.Title: “A bit dank”
Reviews.Author: GatorCraig09
Reviews.Content: arrived woman door left key stood outside door waiting shown surprised fantastic view fifth floor unclean day towels smelled serious body odor soaps stocked bathroom hand towels werent professional gross touching mind bathroom entire floor people bathroom banged wall partner shower water hitting hope dont light shower feel entering dungeon wouldnt location cab stand outside unfortunately loud outside white noise drown screaming people 5th floor bed worn wall dirty probably elsewhere time im rome

Reviews.Title: “Great Place...and affordable”
Reviews.Author: Laura G
Reviews.Content: friend stayed couple days loved cant beat price location family owns cute friendly helpful stayed disconnected bathroom hall cheaper hostel living free breakfast isnt talk probably gone pastries anyways wasnt view window location amazing building nice perfect grandma family drove airport reasonable rate hilarious definitely beat argue taxi drivers trying rip definitely stay

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Primavera
HotelInfo.Address: Piazza San Pantaleo, 3, 00186 Rome, Italy
